name: 特殊教育論題
comment: 建議修習過「特殊教育導論」(SPU5007)同學修習，課程中將不再介紹基礎課程。
goals: 了解特殊教育的內涵、發展和意義Understanding the content, developmental and purpose of special education
了解特殊教育的分類、對象和其需求Understanding the classification of individuals with special needs, and their needs
了解各國特殊教育實施和趨勢Understanding the international trend and practice of special education
能夠因應問題閱讀特殊教育工作所需之文獻Able to search the reference and to read for the problem solving in special education
評估特殊學生的能力、特質、 工作能力Able to assess competence, traits, working competence.
探討資優的身心特質與教育意義Psychological and physiological traits of the gifted and their implications in education
分析創造力的評量與工具運用Analysis of assessment tools and application in measuring creativity
探討身心障礙者就業相關資源與介入Exploring employment related resources and services for persons with disabilities
認同因應特殊需求的專業工作Identifying the professionals for the individual with special needs.
